tool_description: Get Your IP Address as JSON Response
name: MyIPJSON
title: MyIPJSON

api_list.name: getIP
api_list.description: Get your IP Address in JSON Format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://myipjson.p.rapidapi.com/ip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "myipjson.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://myipjson.p.rapidapi.com/ip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "myipjson.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
